page.title: 10Burgh Heath
page.content: The area in which we live is called Burgh Heath. It gives its name to a group of houses on the busy A 217 which is a main road from London to the South Coast. The road cuts the village into two parts and there is another busy road which turns off to Epsom which cuts the village into a further two parts. Despite the roads the area is quite quiet, thanks to the massive heath. There is a green where children can play football or any other games. There are rows of modern houses all connected together to form a block, as well as some much older houses. I have lived there all my life. My family has two Datsun cars, which are Japanese.
